data.text: @ReptileStare I do get a good feeling from those that block...no intellect behind those doors...open if they want though!! Have replies!!

@toojamesp Even if I vehemently disagree with people, I don't block them. A mutual who I accidentally unfollowed (Twitter glitch) got all huffy, and blocked me, so I returned the favour. The only other people I blocked were two tag team scam artists.
@ReptileStare Can't intellectually retaliate so run to the basement!😅
@ReptileStare Live, love, learn, and block those that aren't devoted covidians..
